name: gap-lint
description: GAP-Lint is a linter tool to detect errors and problems in GAP code.
author: Manuel Martins

scripts.clean: rm -rf ./dist && rm -f src/gap.tokens src/gapLexer.js src/gapParser.js src/gapLexer.tokens
scripts.build: npm run setup:antlr && npm run gen:grammar && npm run grunt
scripts.gen:grammar: cd src/ && java -cp antlr-4.7-complete.jar:$CLASSPATH org.antlr.v4.Tool -Dlanguage=JavaScript -no-listener gap.g4
